医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
利用先进的机器学习及早发现心血管疾病如何在症状出现之前发现心血管系统疾病？格拉茨理工大学（TU Graz）的研究人员找到了一种在早期阶段追踪它们的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Early-detection-of-cardioangio-diseases-using-advanced-machine-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Early-detection-of-cardioangio-diseases-using-advanced-machine-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f1c92f7-47d5-4b6d-989b-0aa7ee5892b0 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 07:06:43 -0400 Early detection of cardiovascular diseases using advanced machine learning
加州法案将要求州政府对医疗保健领域的私募股权交易进行审查加州立法机关正在审议一项加强对医疗保健私募股权投资监管的法案，该法案得到了消费者权益倡导者、工会和加州医学协会的热情支持，但也遭到了担心失去潜在资金来源的医院的猛烈抨击。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/California-bill-would-require-state-review-of-private-equity-deals-in-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/California-bill-would-require-state-review-of-private-equity-deals-in-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d093300-9c49-4053-8574-56b7178dde83 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 06:38:01 -0400 California bill would require state review of private equity deals in health care
新研究强调社会经济因素对自闭症青少年多动症的影响儿童邻里特征与注意力缺陷/多动障碍（ADHD）症状之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/New-study-highlights-impact-of-socioeconomic-factors-on-ADHD-in-autistic-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/New-study-highlights-impact-of-socioeconomic-factors-on-ADHD-in-autistic-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=500e1909-26f7-4ce6-9d67-881bddeadd73 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 04:27:00 -0400 New study highlights impact of socioeconomic factors on ADHD in autistic youth
研究发现，优先考虑老年人接种 COVID-19 加强剂可产生最佳公共卫生结果在不同的社会经济环境中，优先考虑老年人接种 COVID-19 加强疫苗接种是否始终能带来最佳的公共卫生结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Prioritizing-older-individuals-for-COVID-19-boosters-yields-best-public-health-outcomes-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Prioritizing-older-individuals-for-COVID-19-boosters-yields-best-public-health-outcomes-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a10e34a-d439-485f-a901-ff3440d78631 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 03:56:00 -0400 Prioritizing older individuals for COVID-19 boosters yields best public health outcomes, study finds
全球推出新型 Biosen C-Line 葡萄糖和乳酸分析仪https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Global-launch-of-new-Biosen-C-Line-glucose-and-Lactate-analyzer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Global-launch-of-new-Biosen-C-Line-glucose-and-Lactate-analyzer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9068fda9-e4b1-4e9a-bdd8-12f96160d27f Tue, 13 Aug 2024 03:35:00 -0400 Global launch of new Biosen C-Line glucose and Lactate analyzer
AlphaFold 通过超越传统方法加速潜在抗精神病药物的发现研究人员使用 AlphaFold 和同源模型来识别有效的 TAAR1 激动剂，显示了 AlphaFold 在神经精神疾病药物发现方面的卓越性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/AlphaFold-accelerates-discovery-of-pottial-antipsychotic-drugs-by-outperforming-traditional-methods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/AlphaFold-accelerates-discovery-of-pottial-antipsychotic-drugs-by-outperforming-traditional-methods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa6e02b6-c433-4002-95b3-d40715165b18 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 00:23:00 -0400 AlphaFold accelerates discovery of potential antipsychotic drugs by outperforming traditional methods
研究警告医生明智选择常见抗生素与严重皮肤反应有关研究表明，磺胺类和头孢菌素类药物会显着增加严重皮肤药物不良反应的风险，凸显了老年患者仔细选择抗生素的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Common-antibiotics-linked-to-severe-skin-reactions-study-warns-doctors-to-choose-wisely.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Common-antibiotics-linked-to-severe-skin-reactions-study-warns-doctors-to-choose-wisely.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f1b2f52-7d90-4d88-b19a-576a657a6025 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 23:39:00 -0400 Common antibiotics linked to severe skin reactions, study warns doctors to choose wisely
研究表明幽默可能是一种有效的育儿工具宾夕法尼亚州立大学研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，笑是最好的良药，但它也可能是一种很好的育儿工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Humor-could-be-an- effective-parenting-tool-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Humor-could-be-an- effective-parenting-tool-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3daa436-ebe3-4968-986a-5f3756bb85b2 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 23:17:00 -0400 Humor could be an effective parenting tool, study suggests
细胞粘附和饥饿被发现是角质形成细胞模式形成的关键驱动因素北海道大学的研究人员发现，角质形成细胞中细胞间粘附诱导的图案可以用饥饿和强粘附来解释。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Cell-adhesion-and-starvation-found-to-be-key-drivers-of-pattern-formation-in-keratinologies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Cell-adhesion-and-starvation-found-to-be-key-drivers-of-pattern-formation-in-keratinologies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=840fdedf-c930-48ed-9734-1e5132c89b81 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 23:14:00 -0400 Cell adhesion and starvation found to be key drivers of pattern formation in keratinocytes
揭示可卡因的人类多巴胺转运蛋白结构，解锁成瘾见解研究人员解析了与可卡因结合的人类多巴胺转运蛋白的高分辨率结构，为可卡因成瘾特性的分子基础提供了重要的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Human-dopamine-transporter-struct-with-cocaine-revealed-unlocking-addiction-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Human-dopamine-transporter-struct-with-cocaine-revealed-unlocking-addiction-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5f942d8-dc9a-458a-ad62-e793c146bb2c Mon, 12 Aug 2024 23:14:00 -0400 Human dopamine transporter structure with cocaine revealed, unlocking addiction insights
